changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW diplomeblanks AS SELECT crd_pcode AS dbk_pcode, crd_spccode AS dbk_spccode, crd_extramural AS dbk_extramural, (psn_firstname || ' ' || psn_middlename || ' ' || psn_lastname) AS dbk_fullname, (date_part('year', crd_edate) != date_part('year', now())) AS dbk_duplicate, crd_red AS dbk_red, crd_diplomenumber AS dbk_diplomenumber, crd_appendixnumber AS dbk_appendixnumber, crd_regnumber dbk_regnumber, crd_diplomedate AS dbk_diplomedate, crd_edate AS dbk_edate FROM cards, persons WHERE (crd_psncode = psn_pcode) AND (crd_remanded = false) AND (date_part('year', crd_diplomedate) = date_part('year', now()))
